title: Fps drops but when alt tab I gain back my fps
body: So ever since this winter update Ive been getting fps drops after the first 2 to 3 mintutes of the game. When I first get into the game I get a solid 60 fps but then I goes down to 30, 29, 28. When I alt tab back into the game it goes back to 60 but then after a few minutes goes back down to low 30s. All my drivers are up to date. I have amd a8 process r5 graphics card if that matters.

replies.body: There could be a variety of issues causing a drop in your fps, and it's good that you've taken steps like updating your drivers.  There could be other reasons as well like game files, so I suggest using the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to go over possibilities.  Let me know if you have any questions!
